name: We're Out of Batteries!
description:
In this simple top-down endless game, you are in a graveyard trying to collect batteries and bring them to a lamp post (Which is how you score points). But you are chased by ghosts overtime, and the more points you score, the more ghosts will come out of their grave. How long will you survive?

*This game is copyrighted to the Animation/Game Dev studio "Kabloosh", you can find him on these social medias in the link here:
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgJ_nluI75C_QeTEkSBDOhw

Twitter: https://twitter.com/KablooshStudio*
